file.name: api.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.2
info:
  title: "API"
  version: "1.0.0"
      
paths:
  /test:
    post:
      summary: Test api which is designed to return models from different packages in any way
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: "models.yaml#/components/schemas/TestModel"
      parameters:
        - name: test
          in: query
          required: true
          schema:
            $ref: "../very/long/dir/models.yaml#/components/schemas/TestEnum"
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: "models.yaml#/components/schemas/TestModel"
